response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's not just any item; it's a game-changer that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to own this product for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can make this happen.", "product_price": 12000}
